name: MonkSweet® V25 - 100% Pure Monk Fruit Extract
description: MonkSweet® V25 - 100% Pure Monk Fruit Extract is with a minimum of 25% mogroside V. With no calories, it is perfect for low-carb diets, keto and paleo friendly! Use MonkSweet V25 Pure Monk Fruit extract anywhere you desire to replace sugar for a deliciously sweet taste with zero calories and zero carbs. MonkSweet V25 starts its origins in the sub-tropical region of Southeast Asia on steep, forested mountains where it has been traditionally grown, harvested and used by Buddhist monks for centuries. From the misty hills to you, MonkSweet V25 monk fruit extract is ideal for sweetening beverages both hot and cold. Use MonkSweet V25 monk fruit extract in minute amounts to sweeten baked goods and desserts without the harmful effects of processed sugar. At 125 times sweeter than sugar, a little goes a very long way. MonkSweet V25 is gluten-free, Non-GMO and Kosher to fit dietary restrictions.
